text: #1 —- Read Phase: — Track the read/write sets of txns and store their writes in a private workspace. #2 — Validation Phase: — When a txn commits, check whether it conflicts with other txns. #3 — Write Phase: — If validation succeeds, apply private chang Otherwise abort and restart the txn. 14 » Bl ) 31:58/1:20:37 - OCC PHASES > & & -— O .
